Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Manager, Event Management & Logistics Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: This position will report to the Senior Manager, Event Development, with the core responsibility of managing and leading our events properties... Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
